attributes.action: To Stop Convicted Criminal Able To Be Defended / Advised In Court
attributes.additional_details:
If a male or female has been found 100% guilty, by way of rock solid evidence / proof such as: CCTV film, DNA, Fingerprints, Solid Witness Statements or in certain cases all of the mentioned positively proven types of evidences.

They should not be able to be defended at all,nor have any lawful support or advisors in court, they should just have their penalty / sentance read out.

This would save time in the courts acelerating the length of time cases take to complete, no more back logs or delays, Massive financial saving (Tax Payer payments). A clear strong message would go out to all innocent general public of all genres that crime does not pay.
